entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 16.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
